<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	Indicate by check mark whether the registrant has submitted electronically and posted on its corporate Web site, if any, every Interactive Data File required to be submitted and posted pursuant to Rule&nbsp;405 of Regulation&nbsp;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&#8209;T (&#xA7;232.405 of this chapter) during the preceding 12&nbsp;months (or for such shorter period that the registrant was required to submit and post such files). Yes&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&#x2612;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;No
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&#x2610;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 2PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	Indicate by check mark if disclosure of delinquent filers pursuant to Item&nbsp;405 of Regulation&nbsp;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&#8209;K is not contained herein, and will not be contained, to the best of the registrant&#x2019;s knowledge, in definitive proxy or information statements incorporated by reference in Part&nbsp;III of this Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&#8209;K or any amendment to this Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&#8209;K.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">

	Indicate by check mark whether the registrant is a large accelerated filer, an accelerated filer, a non

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&#8209;accelerated filer or a smaller reporting company. See definitions of &#x201C;large accelerated filer&#x201D;, &#x201C;accelerated filer&#x201D; and &#x201C;smaller reporting company&#x201D; in Rule&nbsp;12b

	&#8209;2 of the Exchange Act.

<EFX_PART_I>
<A NAME="FIS_PART_I"></A>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	PART I
</FONT>
<A NAME="XNCR-20151231X10K_HTM_PARTI_794811">
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Forward
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#8209;Looking Statements
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	This Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;K or this Annual Report, may contain &#x201C;forward
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;looking statements&#x201D; within the meaning of the federal securities laws made pursuant to the safe harbor provisions of the Private Securiti
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	es Litigation Reform Act of 1995
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. We have based these forward
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;looking statements largely on our current expectations and projections about future events and financial trends affecting the financial condition of our business. Forward
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;looking statements should not be read as a guarantee of future performance or results, and will not necessarily be accurate indications of the times at, or by, which such performance or results will be achieved. Forward
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;looking statements are based on information available at the time those statements are made and/or management&#x2019;s good faith belief as of that time with respect to future events, and are subject to risks and uncertainties that could cause actual performance or results to differ materially from those expressed in or suggested by the forward
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;looking statements. Our actual results could differ materially from those anticipated in these forward
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;looking statements as a result of various factors, including those set forth below under Part&nbsp;I, Item&nbsp;1A, &#x201C;Risk Factors&#x201D; in this Annual Report. These statements, which represent our current expectations or beliefs concerning various future events, may contain words such as &#x201C;may,&#x201D; &#x201C;will,&#x201D; &#x201C;expect,&#x201D; &#x201C;anticipate,&#x201D; &#x201C;intend,&#x201D; &#x201C;plan,&#x201D; &#x201C;believe,&#x201D; &#x201C;estimate&#x201D; or other words indicating future results. Such statements may include, but are not limited to, statements concerning the following:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the initiation, cost, timing, progress and results of our research and development activities, preclinical studies and future clinical trials;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;

<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">

</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;">

	our ability to obtain and maintain regulatory approval of our future product candidates, and any related restrictions, limitations, and/or warnings in the label of an approved product candidate;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	our ability to obtain funding for our operations;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>

</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_BUSINESS>
<A NAME="FIS_BUSINESS"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Item&nbsp;
</FONT>
<A NAME="XNCR-20151231X10K_HTM_ITEM1_269797">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.&nbsp;&nbsp;Business
</FONT>
<A NAME="XNCR-20151231X10K_HTM_BUSINESS_377034">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Our Business
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	clinical
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;stage biopharmaceutical company focused on discovering and developing engineered monoclonal antibod
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	y therapeutics
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to treat severe and life
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;threatening diseases with unmet medical needs.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We use our proprietary XmAb&#xAE; technology platform to create next
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;generation antibody product candidates designed to treat autoimmune and allergic diseases, cancer and other conditions. In contrast to conventional approaches to antibody design, which focus on the portion of antibodies that interact with target antigens, we focus on the portion of the antibody that interacts with multiple segments of the immune system and controls
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	antibody
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	structure. This portion, referred to as the Fc domain, is constant and interchangeable among antibodies. Our engineered Fc domains, the XmAb technology, can be readily substituted for natural Fc domains.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We believe our Fc domains enhance antibody performance by, for example, increasing immune inhibitory activity, improving cytotoxicity, extending circulating half
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;life or stabilizing novel antibody structures, while maintaining 99.5% identity in structure and sequence to natural antibodies. By improving over natural antibody function, we believe that our XmAb
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;engineered antibodies offer innovative approaches to treating disease and potential clinical advantages over other treatments.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;The newest aspect of our platform is the XmAb bispecific Fc domains, which enable the rapid design and simplified development of antibodies that bind two or more antigens simultaneously.&nbsp;&nbsp;Bispecifics are a rapidly emerging area of biotherapeutics development, particularly in immuno-oncology, and we have used our XmAb bispecific Fc domains as a robust scaffold for a pipeline of new bispecific oncology candidates that recruit immune cells against tumors.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We have two wholly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	owned, clinical stage product candidates, XmAb5871
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, which is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	being developed for autoimmune disease and XmAb719
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5, which is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	being developed for asthma and allergic diseases.&nbsp;&nbsp;We also
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	have two wholly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	owned oncology product candidates expected to start clinical trials in 2016, XmAb14045 for the treatment of acute myeloid leukemia and XmAb13676 for B-cell malignancy.&nbsp;&nbsp;These product candidates all use XmAb Fc domains to confer enhanced antibody functionality.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our business strategy is based on the plug
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;play nature of the XmAb technology, allowing us to create new antibody drug candidates for our internal development or licensing, or to selectively license access to one or more of our XmAb technologies to pharmaceutical or biotechnology companies to use in developing their own proprietary antibodies with improved properties.&nbsp;&nbsp;These licensing transactions provide us with multiple revenue streams that help
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	fund development of our wholly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	owned product candidates and usually require limited resources or efforts from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	us
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;There are currently nine antibody product candidates in clinical trials that have been engineered with XmAb technology, including seven candidates being advanced by licensees and development partners.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our protein engineering capabilities allow us to continue to expand the functionality of the XmAb technology platform to identify new protein enhancements and create new antibody drug candidates with improved properties. The most recent addition to our technology, heterodimer Fc domains, enable the creation of bispecific drug candidates, which are antibodies that are engineered to bind two targets simultaneously.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The core of our bispecific programs is a novel Fc domain that is a robust and portable scaffold for two, or potentially more, diff
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	erent antigen binding domains.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Our Fc domain technology is designed to maintain full-length antibody properties in a bispecific antibody, potentially enabling stable molecules with favorable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	in vivo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	half-life and allowing for the use of standard antibody production
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	m
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ethods.&nbsp;&nbsp;These bispecific Fc domains are being used to rapidly generate a broad array of novel drug candidates for our own pipeline and for our partners.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We were founded in 1997 based on protein engineering technology developed by our co-founders Bassil Dahiyat, Ph.D. and Stephen Mayo, Ph.D. at the California Institute of Technology. We began our first therapeutic monoclonal antibody engineering and discovery programs in 2002 and entered into our first XmAb technology license in 2004.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage5"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#XNCR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Our Wholly-Owned Compounds
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our XmAb technolog
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	y has created a suite of wholly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	owned compounds: two XmAb compounds
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	are currently in clinical trials and two XmAb bispecific
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	compounds that we plan to begin
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	clinical trials in 2016. Additional earlier-stage compounds are in development by us as well.
</FONT>
</P>

</FONT>

</TD>

</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:20.00%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Fc Domain
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:03.04%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;PADDING:0PT;">

	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:18.58%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Indication
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.62%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:15.76%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Target
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.62%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;PADDING:0PT;">

	Preclinical

</TABLE>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	XmAb5871
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	uses our XmAb Immune Inhibitor Fc Domain and targets B cells, an important component of the immune system. We believe that XmAb5871 has the potential to address a key unmet need in autoimmune therapies due to its combination of potent B-cell inhibition without B-cell depletion.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In June 2015, we announced results from a Phase 1b/2a&nbsp;&nbsp;placebo-controlled trial of XmAb5871 in patients with rheumatoid arthritis (RA).&nbsp;&nbsp;The results indicated that XmAb5871 was safe and generally well tolerated.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Although the trial was not designed to observe a statistically significant difference in efficacy results between XmAb5871 and placebo treated patients, sufficient efficacy trends were seen to warrant continued clinical development of XmAb5871 in autoimmune indications. A numerically increased proportion of patients with improvements across several measurements of disease activity were observed in the XmAb5871 treated groups compared to placebo.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We are currently enrolling two Phase 2 trials for XmAb5871, one in IgG4-Related Disease (IgG4-RD) and a trial in Systemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	or Lup
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	u
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. We also
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	intend to initiate a Phase 1 trial with a subcutaneous
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	formulation of XmAb5871 in 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	IgG4-RD:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	we are currently enrolling
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a Phase 2 open-label pilot study of XmAb5871 for IgG4-RD. The current trial design is to enroll approximately 24 patients with scheduled treatment up to 24 weeks.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The primary objective of the study is to evaluate the effect of every other week IV administration of XmAb5871 using the recently reported IgG4-RD Responder Index in patients with active IgG4-RD. Secondary objectives are to determine the safety and tolerability profile and to characterize the pharmacokinetics (PK) and immunogenicity of every other week IV administration of XmAb5871
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;IgG4-RD is a rare fibro-inflammatory autoimmune disorder that we estimate impacts up to 40,000 patients in the United States. IgG4-RD affects multiple organ systems and is characterized by the distinct microscopic appearance of disease organs, including dense presence of IgG4-positive plasma cells that is required for diagnosis. This objective diagnostic criterion is atypical for autoimmune diseases and offers advantages for accurately identifying patients. There are currently no approved therapies for this newly recognized disorder and corticosteroids are the current standard of care.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Sys
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	temic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	: we are also enrolling
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a Phase 2 randomized, double blinded, placebo-controlled study of XmAb5871in SLE.&nbsp;&nbsp;This trial is designed to assess the effect of XmAb5871 on SLE disease activity in a shorter timeframe and using fewer patients compared to standard SLE trials, and XmAb5871 is the first newly developed agent being assessed with this novel trial design.&nbsp;&nbsp;The trial design calls for treating patients with moderate to severe, non-organ threatening SLE with XmAb5871 (or placebo) after their lupus disease activity has improved
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	with a short course of intra-muscular (IM) steroid therapy. Background, potentially confounding, immunosuppressant medications will be stopped. In this double-blinded placebo-controlled study, the ability of XmAb5871 to maintain the improvement in disease activity after IM steroid therapy and in the absence of immunosuppressant medication wi
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ll be assessed.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Historically
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	SLE trial designs
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	generally
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	add new medications to the many already taken by the patient, and hence display a discernible treatment effect only when restricted to the sickest patients.&nbsp;&nbsp;The trial will enroll approximately 90 subjects, 1:1 randomized to XmAb5871 or placebo, for up to 24 weeks.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The unmet ne
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ed in lupus remains high for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	estimated 240,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Americans with a lupus diagnosis.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Lupus is a serious and potentially fatal disease that mainly affects women. It is an autoimmune disease that affects many parts of the body, including the joints, skin, kidneys, heart, lungs, blood vessels and brain.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Patients are often subject to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage6"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#XNCR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	prolonged use of systemic corticosteroids and potent immunosuppressive agents with significant shor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	t and long term side effects.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Current biologic treatments are limited by their modest efficacy or safety risks.&nbsp;&nbsp;Because B cells play a significant role in SLE pathogenesis, we believe that XmAb5871is a potential treatment.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition to data from the Phase 1b/2a trial in RA,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	we have
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	published ex vivo results showing XmAb5871 inhibition of SLE patient B cell activation and humoral immunity supporting the investigation of XmAb5871 as a potential SLE therapy.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	XmAb7195
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	uses our Immune Inhibitor Fc Domain
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	is being developed for the treatment of severe asthma and allergic diseases
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	XmAb 7195 is designed to reduce blood serum levels of IgE, which mediates allergic responses and allergic disease.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	In January 2015, we reported
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	top-line interim data from Part 1 of the Phase 1a trial of XmAb7195, in which healthy volunteers received a single dose.&nbsp;&nbsp;Data showed rapid reduction of free IgE levels to below the limit of detection in 90% of treated subjects, including those treated at the lowest dose evaluated of 0.3 mg/kg, with parallel reductions in total IgE.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	Two subjects with high pre-dose IgE levels (above 400 IU/mL) were treated with XmAb7195, one each at 0.75 mg/kg and 3.0 mg/kg doses, and both had reduction of free IgE levels to below the limit of detection lasting for at least one week.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	A dose limiting toxicity of transient, asymptomatic thrombocytopenia (low blood platelet count) was observed at the 3.0 mg/kg dose.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	The decrease in platelet count was transient with a minimum by 24 hours post-dose, recovery starting by 48 hours post-dose and near f
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	ull platelet count recovery by study Day 8 in all cases, at which time serum drug concentrations still exceeded levels that eliminate detectable IgE
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	Moderate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	u
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	rticaria (hives) was reported in a total of seven XmAb7195 treated subjects with an apparent correlation of dose with frequency of occurrence. In all cases regardless of dose, the signs/symptoms of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	u
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	rticaria were mild, non-diffuse and easily treated with oral antihistamine, and the study drug infusions were continued to completion without worsening of symptoms. In 2015, we
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	continued the Phase 1a trial of XmAb7195, treating subjects with high baseline IgE l
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	evels, and in June 2015, we
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	announced an expansion of the trial, adding cohorts of subjects that receive two doses of XmAb7195. The new part of this trial will allow Xencor to examine IgE reduction and the safety of XmAb7195 after a second infusion. Complete data from this study are expected in the first half of 2016.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	We also plan on initiating a multi-dose Phase 1 trial for XmAb7195 with a subcutaneous formulation in healthy volunteers.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	XmAb14045
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	uses our XmAb bispecific Fc technology that allows us to create dual-antigen targeting molecules.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	initiate clinical trials for XmAb14045, our first bispecific oncology candidate, for the treatment of acute myeloid leukemia (AML) in 2016.&nbsp;&nbsp;XmAb14045 targets CD123, an antigen on AML cells and leukemic stem cells, and CD3, an activating receptor on T cells.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The trial will be a Phase 1, open-label, multiple-dose, dose escalation study to assess safety, tolerability and preliminary anti-tumor activity in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	AML
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	XmAb13676
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	is our second bispecific oncology candidate and is expected to enter clinical trials in 2016.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;It targets CD20, an antigen on B-cell tumors, and CD3 for the treatment of B-cell malignancies and is a tumor-targeted antibody that contains both a tumor antigen binding domain (CD20) and a cytotoxic T-cell binding domain (CD3).&nbsp;&nbsp;The trial will be a Phase 1, open-label, multiple-dose, dose escalation study to assess safety, tolerability and preliminary anti-tumor activity in B-cell malignancies.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Out-licensed Compounds
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In addition to our wholly-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	owned compounds in clinical development, we have used our XmAb technology to create antibody compounds which have been licensed to other pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies for further development.&nbsp;&nbsp;These licensed compounds do not require additional development effort by us as they advance into development by our partners.&nbsp;&nbsp;If successful, these candidates will generate additional milestone payments and royalties to support our internal development efforts. These include XmAb5574/MOR208 (now MOR208) licensed to MorphoSys
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	AG (MorphoSys)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, and XmAb13551, a bispecific CD38 x CD3 preclinical candidate, which we developed and licensed to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Amgen
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Inc
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(Amgen)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_4"></A>

	Xencor Out-licensed Compounds

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Primary Stage of
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.38%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;PADDING:0PT;">

	&nbsp;

<TR>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:21.02%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 7.2PT;TEXT-INDENT: -7.2PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Program
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	MOR208
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	is an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	antibody drug candidate originally created by us and developed through a Phase 1 clinical trial.&nbsp;&nbsp;It incorporates our XmAb Cytotoxic Fc Domain. P
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ursuant to a Collaboration and License Agreement (MorphoSys Agreement) with MorphoSys
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	AG (MorphoSys)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in June 2010, this compound
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	is being developed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	MorphoSys for the treatment of blood
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;based cancers.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	MorphoSys is currently conducting Phase&nbsp;2 clinical trials of MOR208 in patients with non-Hodgkin lymphomas (NHL) and chronic lymph
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	cytic leukemia (CLL). MorphoSys has indicated that it has received fast track designation from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) for targeting diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL) and has announced that they
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	intend to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	initiat
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	a Phase 3 t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	rial for this indication in 2017
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	Under the terms of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	MorphoSys
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	Agreement, we received a $13 million upfront payment and $3 million for development milestone payments in 2013.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	If certain developmental, regulatory and sales milestones are achieved, we are also eligible to receive up to an additional $299 million in milestone payments which are comprised as follows: $62.0&nbsp;million in clinical development milestones, $187
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million in regulatory approval milestones and $50
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million of aggregate milestone payments for the achievement of certain product sale goals. If licensed products are commercialized, we are also entitled to receive tiered royalties in the high single
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;digit to low
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;teen percent range.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The term of this agreement will continue until all of MorphoSys&#x2019; royalty payment obligations have expired unless terminated earlier.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	XmAb13551 (CD38 x CD3)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	is a preclinical drug candidate originally created by us and licensed to Amgen in September 2015.&nbsp;&nbsp;It is being developed for the treatment of multiple myeloma. Xmab13551 incorporates our bispecific XmAb Fc domain and binds both the tumor antigen CD38 and a cytotoxic T-cell domain, CD3. Amgen has assumed all responsibility for further development.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Amgen licensed the world
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	wide development rights to XmAb 13551 as part of a September 2015 Research and License Agreement (Amgen Agreement).&nbsp;&nbsp;We received a $45 million upfront payment and will be eligible to receive up to $355 million in milestone payments for XmAb 13551 and tiered high single to low double-digit royalties on global net sales of approved products.&nbsp;&nbsp;Pursuant to the Amgen Agreement, Xencor will also apply its bispecific technology to five specific Amgen provided antibodies (Amgen Discovery Programs). Amgen will assume all preclinical and clinical development for each of the Amgen Discovery Program compounds that Xencor delivers to them. We will be eligible to receive up to $260.5 million in milestone payments for each
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Amgen
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Discovery Program and tiered mid to high single-digit royalties on global net sales of approved products.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Amgen Agreement will continue on a product-by-product basis until the later of (i) the date on which a product candidate is no longer covered by certain intellectual property rights and (ii) a defined term from the first commercial sale of a product candidate. Amgen may terminate the Amgen Agreement on a program-by-program basis with prior written notice. Either party may also terminate the agreement with written notice upon the bankruptcy of or material breach by the other party, if such breach has not been cured within a defined period of receiving such notice.&nbsp;&nbsp;We may terminate the agreement in the event of certain litigation between the parties. In the event of a termination of the CD38 and CD3 program, the rights to such program shall revert to us and Amgen will be eligible to receive tiered single digit sales royalties on the sale of products developed by us from such program.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Our Out-Licensed Technology
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	We selectively license our XmAb technology to other companies for use in their own internal development candidates and to potentially make next-generation improvements to their marketed products.&nbsp;&nbsp;These licenses generally require little or no development effort by us and provide us with cash to fund our own research and development programs.&nbsp;&nbsp;These agreements typically provide the licensee with specific rights to use one or more of our Fc technologies to be applied to their proprietary antibodies or targets. The licensee is generally responsible for all development, of any resulting product candidate. As part of these agreements, we are generally entitled to receive upfront fees, annual licensing fees, potential milestone payments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	royalties on the sales of any resulting products. In connection with our collaboration
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	with Novo Nordisk
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	, we also received research and development funding.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	There are currently eight programs in development with our partners. The most advanced programs are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	Alexion and CSL-Jans
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	en
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	which both entered into Phase 2 stage of development in 2015.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">

</FONT>
</P>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.46%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Amgen
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In September 2015, we entered
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	into
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the Amgen Agreement, providing an exclusive license to our internally developed XmAb 13551 and licenses to our bispecific technology for the five proprietary Amgen Discovery Programs discussed above in Xencor Out-Licensed Compounds.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Alexion
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 9PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In January 2013, we entered into an Option and License agreement (Alexion Agreement) with Alexion Pharmaceuticals,&nbsp;Inc. (Alexion), to make and use our Xtend technology against six different target programs during a five
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;year research term. Alexion is responsible for conducting all research and development activities under the agreement at its own expense.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In addition, we granted to Alexion an exclusive option, on a target
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;target basis, to obtain exclusive commercial licenses to any of the six programs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In March 2015 we received a $500,000 milestone
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	payment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	related to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	achievement of a clinical development milestone
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	with an undisclosed molecule to be used against an undisclosed target. In November 2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Alexion exercised an option for a commercial license on an undisclosed molecule and we received a $4 million option fee.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the fourth quarter of 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, Alexion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	achieved a further development milestone
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	undisclosed compound and we received a $3 million milestone
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	payment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 9PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Absent early termination, the term of the Alexion Agreement will continue until the expiration of Alexio
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	n&#x2019;s royalty payment obligations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Either party may terminate the Alexion Agreement for a material breach by the other party if such breach remains uncured for 60 days, or 30 days in the case of a non-payment breach. Alexion may terminate the agreement without cause on a target
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;target basis upon 90&nbsp;days&#x2019; advance written notice to us.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	CSL-Janssen
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In February 2009, we entered into a Research License and Commercialization Agreement (the 2009 Agreement) with CSL Limited (CSL). Under the 2009 Agreement, we provided CSL with a research license to our Fc Cytotoxic technology and up to five commercial options. We received an upfront payment of $750,000 and annual license fee of $250,000 during the five year research term.&nbsp;&nbsp;In May&nbsp;2013, we entered into an amendment to the 2009 Agreement with CSL, which eliminated a contingent milestone payment requirement and reduced the royalty rate on net sales for the licensed product CSL362. The amendment provided for a payment upon signing of $2.5 million.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In 2013 CSL sublicensed CSL362 (now called JNJ-5602 2473) to Janssen Biotech Inc. (Janssen Biotech). In August 2015, CSL, through its sublicensee, Janssen Biotech, initiated a Phase 2 clinical trial for CSL362. As a result of the Phase 2 clinical trial initiation, we received a milestone payment of $2.5 million.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	CSL
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In March 2013 we entered into a second non-exclusive agreement (2013 Agreement) with CSL for a license to apply our Xtend technology to one of their compounds
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	for which w
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	e received an upfront payment of $500,000. In March 2015, CSL notified us they were terminating the 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Agreement.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Novo Nordisk
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In December 2014, we entered into a Collaboration and License agreement (Novo Agreement) with Novo Nordisk A/S (Novo). Under the terms of the Novo Agreement we granted Novo a research license to use certain
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	technologies including our bispecific, Immune Inhibitor, Xtend and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	other technologies during a two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	-year research term. We will provide research support for four
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	full time employees (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	FTE&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in collaboration with Novo to apply our technologies to Novo provided targets to identify compounds with improved properties. Novo has an option to extend the research term for another twelve months upon written notice to us and payment of another year of research funding. At the end of the research term, Novo will have a commercial license to develop and commercialize any new targets identified during the research term.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We received an upfront payment of $2.5 million and are receiving FTE funding of $1.6 million per year.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Boehringer Ingelheim
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In February 2007, we entered into a research and option agreement (BI Agreement) with Boehringer Ingelheim
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	International GmbH
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(BI) .Under the terms of the BI Agreement we provided a research license to our Cytotoxic XmAb technology and options to non-commercial licenses. BI elected to take options to two licenses and there are currently two compou
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	nds in Phase 1 clinical trials.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Merck
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In July&nbsp;2013, we entered into a License agreement (Merck Agreement) with Merck Sharp&nbsp;&amp; Dohme Corp (Merck). Under the terms of the Merck Agreement, we provided Merck with a non-exclusive commercial license to certain patent rights to our Fc domains to apply to one of their compounds.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We received an upfront payment of $1 million and are receiving annual maintenance fees of $100,000. In 2014 Merck initiated a Phase 1 trial and we received a $500,000 milestone.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	NIH
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In January 2016, we announced that the National Institutes of Health (NIH) has initiated a Phase 1 clinical trial of VRC01LS, a therapeutic antibody for the treatment of HIV that uses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Xtend antibody half-life extension technology.&nbsp;&nbsp;VRC01LS is a humanized monoclonal antibody targeted to the CD4 binding site of HIV-1. VRC01LS is a modification of the VRC01 monoclonal antibody, which demonstrated a suppression of HIV viral load in a Phase 1 trial conducted by NIH.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	VRC01LS includes our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Xtend technology in order to enhance antibody half-life and stability.&nbsp;&nbsp;NIH has not entered into an agreement with us for this technology.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Our Strategy
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	Our goal is to become a leading biopharmaceutical company focused on developing and commercializing engineered monoclonal antibodies to treat severe and life-threatening diseases with unmet medical needs. Key elements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>

	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>

<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Create a pipeline of bispecific candidates for us to advance into clinical development.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	Our XmAb bispecific technology allows us an opportunity to rapidly develop multiple antibody drug candidates with dual targeting mechanisms. We are currently planning to initiate Phase 1 trials for our first two bispecific oncology candidates, XmAb14045 and XmAb13676, in 2016. We have additional candidates at the preclinical stage of development and plan on advancing one or more of these into clinical development in 2017.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	Our bispecific technology, which uses our heterodimeric Fc domain enabling molecules with dual target binding, is an example of the expanding functionality of our XmAb technology platform.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
